title: HTML Basics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of HTML fundamentals

questions.question: What does <!DOCTYPE html> do?
choices: Tells the browser this is HTML5
questions.explanation: It tells the browser to render in HTML5 standards mode.

questions.question: Which section controls what appears in the browser tab?
questions.explanation: The <title> element in the <head> section determines what text appears in the browser tab.

questions.question: Where does the main visible content go?
questions.explanation: The <body> element contains all the visible content that appears on the webpage.

questions.question: How many heading levels exist in HTML?
questions.explanation: HTML has 6 heading levels: <h1> through <h6>, where <h1> is the largest and <h6> is the smallest.

questions.question: What's the correct way to write a paragraph element?
questions.explanation:
The correct syntax for a paragraph element is

content

with both opening and closing tags.
